description: in center a bust of a man in an oval cartouche in a rectangular frame with pediment; plaintings on either side: left- woman holding a child, kneeling male figure and 2 standing male figures; right-angel with standing male figure and Roman soldier laying on a wall
marks:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet below See Inscription
title: Portrait of Louis de Deyster, eleve de Jean Maes
